fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value:
At night, visit a player. You learn what they appear as during that night, and who visited them during that night.
At any time, you can write a complete fake description of all info gained every night.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
When a Town Investigative visits you during the night, you learn their previous night's info.
During the day, people may vote to squeeze you. If this vote passes, your fake description gets revealed as if you are Sponge (4336), and you gain Basic Attack.
**__Part of the Daily Streak Faction__**
